cu.explanation_en: Setting local_s_portc to 99999 exceeds the valid port range (0-65535), causing invalid SCTP configuration and F1 connection failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting ra_ContentionResolutionTimer to 100 is not in the valid set (0-7), causing invalid RACH configuration and cell setup failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 ra_ContentionResolutionTimer 設定為 100 不在有效集合（0-7）中，會導致無效的 RACH 配置和細胞設定失敗。
